direction: Directions to SolveIn each problem, out of the five figures marked (1), (2), (3), (4) and (5), four are similar in a certain manner. However, one figure is not like the other four. Choose the figure which is different from the rest.
question: Choose the figure which is different from the rest.(1)     (2)     (3)     (4)     (5)
answer_description: Each one of the figures except fig. (2), is obtained by the lateral inversion of an English alphabet.
